title: MY ACCOUNT WENT BACK TO LVL 1 and now its lost
body:
WTF RIOT. 
I have played league of legends for 4 years now and 2 days ago when you desided to change something on the servers my account was deleted!
To be more spasific, when i put my name and password and entered my acount it sadently told me that i ned to choose an icon and put a new name on my "new" account. Wtf 

I WAS FUCKING LEVEL 30 / SILVER 5. I HAVE SPENT MORE THAT 150 EUROS € IN LEGUE OF LEGENDS AND MY ACCOUNT IS BACK AT LEVEL 1 AND ITS LIKE I NEVER EVEN PLAYED THE GOD DAMN GAME. THIS IS UNUCCEPTABBLE. MY NAME ON MY PREVIOUS ACOUNT WAS s7gny A bit difficult to forget. Do something, you have stolen money and hours of my life on this fucking game of yours!!!!!

replies.body: There's a pretty good chance you've simply logged into the wrong account, because this one was only made a very short while ago. Let me know if you're able to remember the account you had at level 30 and I can check into that one as well.

I remeber everything from my account. The username the password and the all the things i had bought! 
The probleme is... when i put my name and password it was supposed to open to my old account but it didnt. At first i thought others had this probleme too but then i undestood only very few did. A few daya ago i even sent a message to the discation about the new shard system. I ll chek if my acount still exists there give me some time

No worries, happens to the best of us! Feel free to reach back out to me here and I can try to help as much as I can, but our agents in account recovery might be able to help a little more than I can here (security reasons and all). You can reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more digging if you need!
Thanks but i solved the probleme. I was in the wrong region. Another rioter helped me cause in my computer i had the right account @_@
Ahhhh haha it happens to the best of us every now and then ^_^. Glad everything was figured out!
Riot fucked us. Took our IP made it into dog shit BE, made us waste it all on fucking emotes and chromas. We got FUCKED. They trojan horsed us. Don't expect help my dude.
